# The `ExpansionContext` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Contains options that control response file expansion.

Definition at line 2146 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h">CommandLine.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### expandResponseFiles() {#aebe5d0c3153807263988efc57d69a509}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error ExpansionContext::expandResponseFiles (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; &gt; &amp; Argv)</>}>
Expands constructs &quot;@file&quot; in the provided array of arguments recursively.

Expand response files on a command line recursively using the given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringsaver">StringSaver</a> and tokenization strategy.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h/#l02229">2229</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h">CommandLine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp/#l01234">1234</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp">CommandLine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### findConfigFile() {#aa1382b606ff796c22a7416ba7f6b856b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ExpansionContext::findConfigFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FileName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; char &gt; &amp; FilePath)</>}>
Looks for the specified configuration file.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="[in] FileName">Name of the file to search for.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[out] FilePath">File absolute path, if it was found.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if file was found.
</SectionUser>

If the specified file name contains a directory separator, it is searched for by its absolute path. Otherwise looks for file sequentially in directories specified by SearchDirs field.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h/#l02214">2214</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h">CommandLine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp/#l01389">1389</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp">CommandLine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### readConfigFile() {#af5cd2f517db910af1c9fd3c0cb03161c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error ExpansionContext::readConfigFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> CfgFile, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; &gt; &amp; Argv)</>}>
Reads command line options from the given configuration file.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="[in] CfgFile">Path to configuration file.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[out] Argv">Array to which the read options are added.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if the file was successfully read.
</SectionUser>

It reads content of the specified file, tokenizes it and expands &quot;@file&quot; commands resolving file names in them relative to the directory where CfgFilename resides. It also expands &quot;&lt;CFGDIR&gt;&quot; to the base path of the current config file.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h/#l02226">2226</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h">CommandLine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp/#l01426">1426</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp">CommandLine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### CurrentDir {#a2d4aad5eb8050d4d7523db26e10ce727}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef llvm::cl::ExpansionContext::CurrentDir">
Path used to resolve relative rsp files.

If empty, the file system current directory is used instead.
